GridUserPreferences.name: Activity List
GridUserPreferences.gridOptionsJsString: { "columnDefs": [ { "headerName": "Activity Name", "headerCheckboxSelection": true, "checkboxSelection": true,"headerCheckboxSelectionFilteredOnly": true,"filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "minWidth": 100, "field": "subject", "cellRenderer": function(params) { if (params.data.salesOpportunityId != null && params.data.salesOpportunityId != "") return '' + params.data.subject + ''; else return '' + params.data.subject + ''; } }, { "headerName": "Description","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "field": "comments", "minWidth": 325, "maxWidth": 325, "tooltipField": "comments", "cellRenderer": function(params) { let comments = params.data.comments; let value = comments; if (comments && comments.length > 60) { value = comments.substring(0, 60) + '...'; } return value; } }, { "headerName": "Activity Type", "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "field": "activityType", "minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "Activity Status", "field": "status","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "FSR ID", "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "field": "srId", "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "FSR Name", "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "field": "srName", "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "Location", "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "field": "location","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "Sch.Start Date", "field": "plannedStartDate", "minWidth": 100,"filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "cellRenderer": function(data) { var value = data.value; if (value instanceof Date && !isNaN(value)) return data.value ? new Date(data.value).toLocaleDateString() : ""; else return data.value ? data.value : ""; }, "comparator": dateFieldComparator }, { "headerName": "Sch.End Date", "field": "plannedEndDate","filter": true,"minWidth": 100,"floatingFilter": true, "cellRenderer": function(data) { var value = data.value; if (value instanceof Date && !isNaN(value)) return data.value ? new Date(data.value).toLocaleDateString() : ""; else return data.value ? data.value : ""; }, "comparator": dateFieldComparator }, { "headerName": "Actual Start Date","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "field": "actualStart", "minWidth": 100, "cellRenderer": function(data) { var value = data.value; if (value instanceof Date && !isNaN(value)) return data.value ? new Date(data.value).toLocaleDateString() : ""; else return data.value ? data.value : ""; }, "comparator": dateFieldComparator }, { "headerName": "Actual End Date","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "field": "actualCompletion", "minWidth": 100, "cellRenderer": function(data) { var value = data.value; if (value instanceof Date && !isNaN(value)) return data.value ? new Date(data.value).toLocaleDateString() : ""; else return data.value ? data.value : ""; }, "comparator": dateFieldComparator }, { "headerName": "Activity Owner", "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "field": "ownerName", "minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "Primary Contact", "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "field": "contactName", "minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "Activity Work Type", "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "field": "workType", "minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "Start & End Time Reqd", "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "field": "isScheduled", "minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "Phone","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "field": "phone", "minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "Auto-Close", "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "field": "onceDone", "minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "Duration", "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "field": "wftMsdduration", "minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "Technician Arrival Window", "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "field": "arrivalWindow", "minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "Activity ID", "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"field": "iaNumber", "minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "Created On", "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"field": "createdOn", "sortable": true, "minWidth": 100, "cellRenderer": function(data) { var value = data.value; if (value instanceof Date && !isNaN(value)) return data.value ? new Date(data.value).toLocaleDateString() : ""; else return data.value ? data.value : ""; }, "comparator": dateFieldComparator }, { "headerName": "Modified By","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "field": "modifiedByName", "sortable": true, "minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "Completed Date", "filter": "agTextColumnFilter","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "field": "closedDate", "minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "Completed By", "field": "closedByName", "sortable": true, "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"minWidth": 100 } ], "defaultColDef": { "flex": 1, "wrapText": true, "autoHeight": true, "sortable": true }, "scrollbarWidth": 30, "pagination": true, "paginationPageSize": 20, "suppressRowClickSelection": false, "filter": true, "floatingFilter": true,"rowSelection": "multiple", "domLayout": "autoHeight", "custom": { "dataUniqueIdField": "iaNumber", "rowSelection": "multiple", "csvExportOptions": { "fileName": "List_Of_Activites.csv", "skipHeader": false } } }
